name: 3D Snake (funblaster22)
description:
The classic game of Snake, but with a twist. Control your character across not one, but three different planes! Look on from a 3rd person, isometric view. Feedback is very much appreciated, as I might be adding more features in the future.

How to play:
  • You are the orange & green cube
  • Control with the arrow/WASD keys
  • Use 'R' & 'F' to go up & down respectively
  • Ability to adjust cube size & player speed for additional challenge
  • Move towards the red pellet. Collecting one makes your snake longer
  • Don't go out of bounds, or else you DIE
  • The grid surrounding you helps to determine the position of the snake
